name: MilkyThief
description:
Your caregivers left you without leaving any milk.
The only solution is a trip to the neighbor's house, but his cats are not eager to share their milk - so, get it yourself!
Milky Thief is a casual stealth game in which, while avoiding the eyes of your opponents, you try to steal milk and escape from a room full of dangers as quickly as possible. A game created for DSW's GameJam, Hello Game Jam 2022 in two days by:

Jakub Bera

Mikołaj Kaczmarczyk

Bartosz Jarzębowski

Piotr Wojtaszek

 Controls:

WASD / Arrows - Moving
Space - Jumping
